text: He was always a smooth liar. He invented some plausible story or other and threw himself on the Caxtons' generosity. They accepted him as a kind of substitute for the boy they had lost. Outside the family he began to pass himself off as Michael Caxton. The father was well-off and easy-going. He was easy meat for Pete. He was alwags a smooth eicur. He invenkd rome plausible story or other andthrew himself on the Carton's genarosity.They accepted him as a Kindof substitute for the boy they had eost Ou+side the femily he eegen to pae himcels o a Michcel cax+on.The father was wee-o
